name: 1000 Light Years
description:
1000 Light Years is a game made in 2 weeks.

You and your crew are the only survivors of an alien attack.
Will you be able to reach earth before they reach you ?

Just remember that in space it can get really bad really fast.

/!\Install Infos /!\

If the installer tells you to reboot your PC, you don't actually have to do it. I don't know why it does that I'm working on it.

Also widows doesn't recognize me as an official editor.  So it will probalbly tell you that the game installer is dangerous. But I promise it is not. You will have to trust me on this one ;)
